name: Time Rebuild
description:
Time Rebuild is 2d top down shooter, in which you can use short ranged teleportation to your advantage

This game was created for #ZostanWDomuRobGry Game Jam

theme for which was "Rebuild"

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Mouse - Aim

Mouse Left Button - Shoot

Mouse Right Button - Teleport

Number keys/Scroll Wheel - Change Weapon

Credits

NoelOskar - Scripts,Graphics,Game Design

SwiatowskiSoundDesign - Music,Sound effects,Game Design
